resources.string: We are happy to see you.\nAre you ready to discover our latest news?
"Tell us about your preferences so we can adjust the contentsto your needs."
"Este cartão deve aparecer em segundo lugar na listagem."
"Este cartão deve aparecer em terceiro lugar na listagem."
First things first. What is your name?
"Pleased to meet you, Renata. In order to adjust contents to your preferences we will ask you a few questions."
